mil3.4.6:1.3_1: khuddakopi pāsāṇo pākatike aggimhi pakkhitto divasampi paccamāno na vilayaṁ gacchati,
mil3.4.6:1.3_2: kūṭāgāramattopi pāsāṇo nerayikaggimhi pakkhitto khaṇena vilayaṁ gacchatī’ti, etaṁ vacanaṁ na saddahāmi,
mil3.4.6:1.3_3: evañca pana vadetha ‘ye ca tattha uppannā sattā,
mil3.4.6:1.3_4: te anekānipi vassasahassāni niraye paccamānā na vilayaṁ gacchantī’ti,
mil3.4.6:2.2_1: yā tā santi makariniyopi susumāriniyopi kacchapiniyopi moriniyopi kapotiniyopi,
mil3.4.6:2.2_2: kiṁ nu tā kakkhaḷāni pāsāṇāni sakkharāyo ca khādantī”ti?
mil3.4.6:2.4_0: “Kiṁ pana tāni tāsaṁ kucchiyaṁ koṭṭhabbhantaragatāni vilayaṁ gacchantī”ti?
mil3.4.6:2.6_0: “Yo pana tāsaṁ kucchiyaṁ gabbho, sopi vilayaṁ gacchatī”ti?
mil3.4.6:2.10_1: kammādhikatena nerayikā sattā anekānipi vassasahassāni niraye paccamānā na vilayaṁ gacchanti.
mil3.4.6:3.2_1: yā tā santi sīhiniyopi byagghiniyopi dīpiniyopi kukkuriniyopi,
mil3.4.6:3.2_2: kiṁ nu tā kakkhaḷāni aṭṭhikāni maṁsāni khādantī”ti?
mil3.4.6:3.4_0: “Kiṁ pana tāni tāsaṁ kucchiyaṁ koṭṭhabbhantaragatāni vilayaṁ gacchantī”ti?
mil3.4.6:3.6_0: “Yo pana tāsaṁ kucchiyaṁ gabbho, sopi vilayaṁ gacchatī”ti?
mil3.4.6:3.10_1: kammādhikatena nerayikā sattā anekānipi vassasahassāni niraye paccamānā na vilayaṁ gacchantī”ti.
mil3.4.6:4.2_1: yā tā santi yonakasukhumāliniyopi khattiyasukhumāliniyopi brāhmaṇasukhumāliniyopi gahapatisukhumāliniyopi,
mil3.4.6:4.2_2: kiṁ nu tā kakkhaḷāni khajjakāni maṁsāni khādantī”ti?
mil3.4.6:4.4_0: “Kiṁ pana tāni tāsaṁ kucchiyaṁ koṭṭhabbhantaragatāni vilayaṁ gacchantī”ti?
